    • sg.edu.nus.comp.cs4218.impl.extended1中ATool的使用

      sg.edu.nus.comp.cs4218.impl.extended1中ATool的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  GrepTool
      The grep command searches one or more input files for lines containing a match to a specified pattern.
      class  PipingTool
      PipingTool pipes the output of previous command to the next command as input If any of the command encounters error (i.e. exit with non-0 code), stop piping and print generated output up to that point If any of the command string given is not valid, it prints ERROR_MSG_NULL_CMD On interrupt (CTRL-Z), exit with code 0 and print generated output up to that point
